Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory234.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: "It's finally done!!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Pulao leans against the desk and stretches her body widely, having meticulously rearranged the manuscript that you both worked on together.'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "With your help, I'm sure my book will be a big hit!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'But does this really count as an autobiography...?', 3: '9'}

{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'The KCC folks mentioned that including keywords like bestseller, hit, or Kowloong trend will help me get more views. And "the first autobiography novel" sounds pretty cool, doesn\'t it?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Pulao pulls out her terminal, taps on a shopping app, and places it in front of you.'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Look, all these items have so many keywords.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'From the interface displayed by Pulao, it is evident that her shopping cart is already filled with an astonishing quantity of items.'}
{2: "Hmm? Kowloong's Magical Girl edition...", 3: '15'}
{3: 'Pulao quickly retrieves the terminal, hiding it behind her back.'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "Ahem... That's not important.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Pulao takes out her terminal again. After a few swipes on the screen, a new idea seems to strike her.'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'What do you think about posting some ads on the Kowloong internal forum during the launch?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'And I heard that authors from a looong time ago would also use lots of tags to attract attention.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'But is it really okay to make things up...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Well, I suppose I\'ll change it to something like "the debut of Pulao after working on it for three whole months"...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Pulao picks up the speech draft, crosses out the original section, and begins writing again. However, after a few sentences, she ends up striking out the revisions.'}
{3: 'Pulao crumples the paper into a ball and tosses it into the trash can before wearily slumping into the chair.'}
{2: "You're working really hard on this.", 3: '31', 4: "Giving up just like that isn't your style!", 5: '31'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "If I were a true martial arts master, I'd be a role model for everyone. That's why I want this book to make a mark.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "If people see me as the heroine in the book, it'll be really motivating!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "Even though I'm far from that now, that doesn't change my desire to be a role model for everyone.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "That's why I wrote it.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Pulao sits up straight in the chair, carefully smoothing out the manuscript.'}
{2: 'I believe you will become a true martial arts master.', 3: '38'}
{2: 'Before that, you have to believe in your current self.', 3: '39'}
{3: 'Pulao tidily arranges the manuscript in her hand, tapping the stack of papers on the desk.'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "Forget it! I'm not going to think about those flashy gimmicks anymore!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "If people enjoy it, they'll surely come to buy it, and your help will only make it even better, heehee.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Nervously, Pulao adds a name to the front of the manuscript: "【kuroname】".'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "You're definitely going to be a big hit.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Softly, Pulao murmurs as she leans her face toward the completed draft as if tending to something living.'}
